description: This file implements the advanced state-access functions of the Dslh Object Controller Object in a broadband device management context. It includes functions for retrieving instance contexts, checking instance existence, parameter existence, parameter writability, validating hierarchy interfaces, and resetting object states.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE DslhObjcoGetInsContext(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the instance context handle. Returns 'hInsContext' from the object, which typically refers to the instance context.

methods.name: BOOL DslhObjcoCheckInstance(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Checks whether an instance exists or is valid. Uses the TR-069 interface callback if available.

methods.name: BOOL DslhObjcoCheckParamExistence(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PCHAR pParamName)
methods.description: Determines if a parameter's existence is dynamic; defaults to TRUE, indicating the parameter should be populated.

methods.name: ULONG DslhObjcoCheckParamWritability(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PCHAR pParamName)
methods.description: Checks if a parameter's writability is dynamic. Defaults to 'DSLH_OBJCONTROLLER_PARAM_WRITE_NOTCHANGE', meaning no change based on dynamic conditions.

methods.name: BOOL DslhObjcoValidateHierarchyInterface(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PCHAR pHierarchName,ULONG uType)
methods.description: Validates a hierarchy interface name and type. Currently always returns TRUE.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjcoReset(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets object state by clearing parent and instance context handles.
